title: Inventors
text:
Jason Bowman
Engineering major at Harvey Mudd College (grad 25), with experience in embedded systems, electrical engineering, control systems, DSP, electromechanical systems, and mechanical design.



Micro Ps was a must-take class as I aimed to bridge the gap between idea and product. In the past, I have done personal projects involving digital electronics, where the knowledge gained in this class would have proved immensely helpful. Squat Hero is the first of many future personal projects involving embedded systems and digital electronics that I plan on doing

title: Walking Couch
text:
Welcome to our final project for Mechanical Design, a course at Harvey Mudd College focused on mechanical principles, analysis techniques, group design workflows, and product development.
This project focuses on the physical design, analysis, and implementation of an electromechanical Jansen linkage system capable of carrying a couch and passenger, allowing for stylish transport around Harvey Muddâ€™s campus. Further information about technical specifics and design decisions can be found in the tabs above.
